tables.title: Iso-Seq Transcript Classification

columns.description: Total number of CCS reads in the input file; this will be identical to the value in the CCS report
The number of CCS reads with a 5-prime signal detected
The number of CCS reads with a 3-prime signal detected
The number of CCS reads with poly-A and 3-prime signals detected
The number of CCS reads whose read length is less than the specified minimum sequence length
The number of non-full-length CCS reads; these are missing the poly-A tail and/or a terminal signal
The number of full-length CCS reads (Full-length reads are reads which have both prime signals and poly-A detected)
The number of full-length CCS reads that are not artificial concatemers
Mean length of full-length, non-artificial-concatemer CCS reads
The number of non-full-length non-artificial-concatemer CCS reads
The number of non-full-length reads that are artificial concatemers
Total number of bases in full-length non-artificial-concatemer CCS reads
